projects.title: Polimap — Geo-analytics (NDA)
projects.problem: Local area teams needed fast spatial insights for reporting and anomaly checks.
projects.approach: ETL in Python/SQL with PostGIS spatial joins and FastAPI backend; QA pipeline + RBAC.
projects.outcome: Heatmaps render ~10k points in ~3s; reliable spatial metrics; fewer manual checks.

projects.title: PowerCo — Churn Prediction
projects.problem: Reduce churn by identifying high-risk customers while keeping false positives manageable.
projects.approach: EDA + feature engineering; XGBoost with calibrated thresholds; recall-first framing.
projects.outcome: Recall ≈0.97 @0.30 threshold (precision trade-off noted); clear stakeholder guidance.

projects.title: Citi — FP&A Pack
projects.problem: Month-end required clear variance explanations and scenario notes tied to Basel III metrics.
projects.approach: Built KPI/variance packs in Excel + SQL; standardized price/mix/volume drivers; templated exec summaries; added scenario notes referencing RWA/CAR.
projects.outcome: Clear variance drivers; faster month-end decisions; reusable packs reduced rework cycles.

projects.title: Cognizant — Gala ML
projects.problem: Warehouses needed to predict stock availability and reduce stockouts.
projects.approach: Supervised regression with feature engineering on inventory & demand signals; evaluation and error analysis.
projects.outcome: Improved allocation decisions and lowered stockout risk (internal KPI uplift).

projects.title: KPMG — Sales-CLV
projects.problem: Marketing needed segments and lifetime value signals to target offers efficiently.
projects.approach: RFM segmentation + predictive CLV modeling; dashboarded insights for campaigns.
projects.outcome: Clear segment actions and CLV forecasts to guide spend and targeting.

projects.title: Tata — BI Sprint
projects.problem: Execs needed real-time visibility into operational KPIs.
projects.approach: Interactive Tableau dashboards with SQL data pipelines; defined metric calculations and refresh cadence.
projects.outcome: Faster operational decisions; reduced manual report prep.
